Meaning_English: to love; affection; to be fond of; to like

Meaning_English: roots or stems of plants; origin; source; this; the current; root; foundation; basis; classifier for books; periodicals; files etc; originally

Meaning_English: you're welcome; impolite; rude; blunt; don't mention it

Meaning_English: big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; oldest; eldest

Meaning_English: of; structural particle: used before a noun; linking it to preceding possessive or descriptive attributive

Meaning_English: drop (of liquid); stain; spot; speck; jot; dot stroke (in Chinese characters); decimal point; point; mark (of degree or level); a place (with certain characteristics); iron bell; o’clock; a little; a bit; some; (point) unit of measurement for type; to touch on briefly; to make clear; to light; to ignite; to kindle; period of time at night (24 minutes) (old); a drip; to dibble; classifier for small indeterminate quantities

Meaning_English: all; both; entirely (due to) each; even; already

unworthy; to let down; I'm sorry; excuse me; pardon me; if you please; sorry? (please repeat)
